New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the first Proteas man to score a century in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw and Quinton de Kock put on a tournament record 163 for the second wicket in 13.3 overs
Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada ran riot in the powerplay, taking three wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh needed their third-highest T20I score to claim a memorable victory but were soon pegged back
South Africa's pace battery secured their second-largest T20I win in terms of runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain threatened the game initially but did not affect the final result
Bangladesh's Shakib al Hasan's dismissal summed up their fortunes
